subject: Religion & Spirituality
subcategory: Sacred Texts That Shaped the World
title: The Gnostic Scriptures: Secret Knowledge
description: A quick, practical guide to The Gnostic Scriptures: Secret Knowledge.

hook.text: The material world is a prison. The true God is hidden. Only secret knowledge can free you. Gnostics told a wild story.

buildup.text: Gnostic texts describe a flawed creator god who trapped souls in matter. Salvation comes through gnosis: inner knowing.

discovery.text: The 1945 Nag Hammadi discovery in Egypt revealed dozens of Gnostic texts that the Church had tried to destroy.

twist.text: Gnosticism challenged Christianity's core: if the creator is evil, the Bible's God is the villain, not the hero.

climax.text: Destroyed but not forgotten. Gnostic ideas keep returning in art, film, and philosophy. Suppressed texts never die.

punchline.text: Gnostics said the creator was the villain. The Church burned their books.

quiz.question: What did Gnostics believe?
options: The material world is a prison and salvation comes through secret spiritual knowledge
